name: Siren Head: In The Wild
description:
Siren Head: In The Wild is a short game inspired by the FNaF minigames. There are two endings and some nice 3D rendered newspaper clippings at the end. It stars - you guessed it - everyone's friendly neighborhood Siren Head! I made this in an afternoon but I think it turned out pretty alright. 

Made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5
